attributes.action: Hold an annual "state of the nation" televised debate between party leaders.
attributes.background:
The public have been disenfranchised from politics and do not value or support a lot of politicians.

To maintain public faith in our political process we need to engage them better in that process.

A televised debate provides a spectacle where the value of debate can be witnessed.

rejection.details: This is a decision for broadcasters, not the Government or Parliament.
